item.title: Demo mission
item.description: Introduction The demo mission is a project in the VEAF GitHub repository that can be forked to serve as the basis of a new mission using the VEAF Mission Creation Tools. It does not include all the features of the tools; for a more in-depth example, you can check the VEAF-Open-Training-Mission repository. How to set up a mission Start by forking or cloning the VEAF-Demo-Mission repository. You can then use the files you cloned as an example, or use your fork to create a new mission.
